summary: Keith Carradine stars alongside a young, popular cast in this inspiring second chapter of the beloved Cowgirls 'N Angels story filled with heart, horses & high-reaching adventure.
cast: Haley Ramm|Bryan Dechart|Glynn Turman|Emily Bett Rickards|Walt Roberts|Kim Whalen|Amber Dawn Landrum|Leslie-Anne Panaligan|Haley Ganzel|Derrick Strickland|Marin Hinkle|Mark Nutter|Keith Carradine|Anne Lockhart|Spencer Boldman|Jade Pettyjohn|Liz Mikel|Jennie Kamin|Joe Nemmers|Julie Ann Emery|Eric Simmons|Raylee Magill|Gloria Gonnillini|Amber Hayes|Graham Montgomery|Aaron Williamson
